name: Sunset Glow
description:
A Fairly Brief Experience About A Cube Trying To Climb A Cliff Trying To Get To The Top And...Well I Wont Spoil It For You :)

He Has A Special Ability To Switch His Color From Blue To Red And From Red to Blue-Which Will Come In Handy During His Adventure To The Top As He Explodes Bombs To Unlock Paths, Carefully Avoid Lazers And Takes Elevators To Help Him Get To The Top Of The Cliff Quicker!

I Have Nothing Else to Say. Just Download The Game :)
